Note: this section might be incomplete because some assets are not reported.
There are two reasons for an asset to appear in this section: (1) The asset is placed in the city but is missing (2) The asset is used by some other asset but is missing.
To track missing assets, enable the option 'Load used assets'.

The following enabled assets are currently unnecessary (not used in this city)
There are two reasons for an asset to appear in this section: (1) The asset is enabled but unnecessary (2) The asset is included in an enabled district style but is unnecessary.

In most cases duplicate names are fine; using duplicates can save memory and speed loading.
However, some duplicates (e.g. network elevations) can cause problems.
